title: Tsunami in a Bottle
summaries: The Tsunami in a Bottle is an accessory which can be found in Wooden, Iron, Pearlwood(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), and Mythril Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).

Similar to the <linked>Cloud in a Bottle</linked>, it allows the player to double-jump. Instead of a cloud beneath the player's feet, it creates burst of water when jumping. The Tsunami jump goes 7 tiles into the air, totalling 13 tiles when put together with the first jump.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows the holder to double jump
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
